website_summaries.verdict: An affordable set of shopping bags with a simple but exceptionally sturdy construction. Stylish prints stand out from the crowd and make these bags all the more versatile.
pros: Ripstop nylon construction is waterproof and lightweight
Boasts a large capacity and an impressive 50 lb
Long handles can be slung over the shoulder
Folds up into a sewn on storage pouch
Each bag has a different print
cons: Folding them small enough to fit into the storage pouch can take some practice

customer_reviews.title: Great washable, reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: I love that these bags are machine washable! The ripstop fabric is very durable and the colors are vibrant. The bags offer plenty of space without being too big and awkward. I take these bags on all my shopping trips.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly strong reusable bags! I love the large size and cute prints. Please see photos, I have placed a bluray on top of the bags to give you an idea of their size. It's also really easy to fold them back into the attached pouches. I now always have a few of these in my purse!
customer_reviews.author: Original

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely lovely, useful and environment friendly! The design is so adorable and the bags are actually bigger than I thought. It fits everything perfectly. They material is very strong too. Got many compliments on this
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Large and sturdy as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bags that really do fit over the shoulder. Used the blue tortoise one today for venture to Botanical Garden and Arthur Ave w friends. Was able to place the gift shop bag into this one and carry new plants around. They did very well. So I am happy with these totes. Recommend, fold it up, does not take up much space when folded.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shopping bags!
customer_reviews.text: Several years ago, I was in Germany for several weeks for work and Europe is cutting back on using plastic bags when shopping. So, in order to not have to continuously buy plastic bags, I bought a bag like one of these. It was great! I could easily carry 3 big bottles of water along with other items and when I wasn't using it, I would simply fold it up and keep it in my bag in case I needed it. Getting 6 of these is a great deal! Plus, the patterns on them are so great, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Hildie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for really durable bags
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Super durable, easy to fold up & carry with you. It’s the first time I’ve ever been able to stick with using reusable bags- absolutely no complaints.... it holds up to my grocery shopping, library book runs (I’ve put 11 thick books in one bag with no problem) and more. And they are easy to clean- you can toss these in the washer and hang to dry.
customer_reviews.author: JM Cruz

customer_reviews.title: You don't get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that I got ripped off! The deal was that you get 6 not 5! All I got was 5! I would never get these again! People don't buy these you don't get what you pay for! I wish I could contact the seller somehow and tell them that I only got five they owe me one! Also these are very very thin and flimsy with no bottoms. If you put too much and they will rip and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Carol maysa

customer_reviews.title: smell
customer_reviews.text: When I opened bag , smell was so bad my husband made me put the bags outside! Hope it was a mistake on mine sent back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I recently received my Bee Green bags. They are a bit larger than the reusable bag I purchased from the grocery store. The handle actually fits over my shoulder. And, they fold into their own attached bag. When folded, two of them fit into a smaller space than one of the reusable bags I purchased from the grocery store. I can put one in my back pocket, several in the door pocket of my car, in my glove compartment, ... I can update when I have had more time to use them. So far, a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra roomy bags.
customer_reviews.text: I got this set to cut down on the amount of plastic bags I was using. I thought well with 6 I will be able to fit almost everything and maybe use a couple plastic bags, but these will literally fit an entire cart full of stuff. I was so impressed and it made everything easier to carry inside. Way better than I expected! I don't bother folding them I just have all of them in one bag in the car for the next grocery outing.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Winter

customer_reviews.title: Only received 5 of the 6 bags ordered
customer_reviews.text: I love the bags! They're cute and large. But I didn't receive all of them. I didn't get the blue turtle one but I paid for all 6.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Do not like these
customer_reviews.text: These are too flimsy and everything falls all over the place I prefer the ones I purchased afterwards with a cardboard bottom that folds in so that things stay put and hold the shape
customer_reviews.author: BIZZY M.

customer_reviews.title: PASS
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible they do not open wide and the material is scratchy
customer_reviews.author: Dr. C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product except
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight but durable enough to hold quite a bit. I love how little space they take up when folded nicely. I would have given this product 5 stars however they packaged everything in plastic! The point of purchasing these is to reduce the amount of plastic going into the garbage. I would love it if you packaged it In recyclable cardboard instead
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Our state recently banned disposable plastic bags so I was looking for an option that I could keep in my bag in case I had to run a quick errand and to make sure I didn’t forget it. These bags fold up nicely and are much more durable than I thought they’d be. I would say each bags holds about 3 plastic bags worth of groceries. The cashiers at the stores always compliment me on the bags and ask me where I get them from. I recommend them to my friends to keep them in their purses or glove compartments as they hold a lot and fold up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: DeeL42

customer_reviews.title: No Instructions
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions included on how to fold them into the pouches. Not the end of the world but still disappointing. I was also disappointed that there was one bag without a pouch to fold into. There were six bags as described but only five with pouches.
customer_reviews.author: David Perez

customer_reviews.title: Cute Prints on the Outside, but...
customer_reviews.text: My older and much sturdier reusable grocery bags fell out of my cart recently, and disappeared so I needed replacements. These bags are just ok. The animal prints on the outside are cute, but the fabric is thin, slippery-like and there isn't any internal structure so everything slids on top of each other and to the center when you lift the bag up by it's handles. I will be looking for other bags because these don't fit my shopping needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: NYS Bag Ban Solution
customer_reviews.text: Need bags that fold up and can be easily stored in your backpack, purse or car? BUY THESE Need to bag heavy groceries? Things of awkward sizes? Random crap? BUY THESE Do you live in New York and have to find a solution to the plastic bag ban? BUY THESE Do you live in any state or country but have things to carry in a bag? BUY THESE For real, buy these. I bought them for my wife, friends and myself after lots of reviewing/shopping around. These bags can be washed or wiped with a lysol wipe. I have a lot of tote bags and reusable grocery bags and these are the only ones that I actually use.
customer_reviews.author: jessicalee

customer_reviews.title: Machine washable! Not bulky!
customer_reviews.text: Love these reusable bags! The prints are cute & I get lots of compliments. There are little loops on the tops that can fit on many (not all) plastic bag holders at the grocery store. I've stuffed a lot of groceries in these bags and filled them heavy - no failures yet. The handles are large enough to wear a bag as a shoulder bag and wide enough for a good grip. They fold into their own little built in pouch. I keep them on a carabiner & hook it to the headrest in my car or on my purse. Machine washable (hang to dry).
customer_reviews.author: J Eli

customer_reviews.title: Colors beyond beautiful, and machine washable
customer_reviews.text: Love theses bags. Bought 2 sets. Bigger than plastic grocery store bags but not so big that they are too much to carry, which you can do over the shoulder. Easy to grab a handful of them and stick in purse on your way out the door or into store. Maine just passed a law banning single use plastic shopping bags. With these on hand, I won’t miss them! And the colors are so GORGEOUS it’s like carrying a rainbow with you. Great product, BeeGreen. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: ev k

customer_reviews.title: These are the BEST
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. They fold up inside the built in pouch. I keep one in my purse all the time. My biggest problem before purchasing these was forgetting to bring the bags into the store with me. Now, I've always got 1or 2 with me. They're strong, large interior size, water proof AND have sturdy handles long enough to tie when put in the cargo area. I was able to get rid of my old, cracked reusable bags...over time they smelled 😕. These are machine washable and very versatile. I've had many inquiries as to where I purchased them. I even bought a few sets to use as stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and easy to use. They may be sturdier and have more durability than I am giving them credit for since I have not used them that long. The fabric is thin, which makes me suspect they're not so sturdy and durable. I'll write a correction if regular use proves this idea wrong. I do wish you could choose a specific theme. I got an "animals" set, but I'd really like to have a set that's all cats. I expect that dog lovers would like set of all dogs as well. Given how long I currently expect them to last, the price is right. If they last longer, they are a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Crowell Davis

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose Bags - Durable & Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely variety of patterns. Good capacity. I bought these for grocery shopping but I also find them useful for transporting everyday items when it's raining (I live in a rainy region). My laptop and plug-ins fit squarely in the the bottom of the bag (photo shown here). So far the bags have proven to be durable. Yes, they are flimsy but otherwise they wouldn't be so easily compacted - you can carry all of the bags and take up barely any space. I shop with them along with sturdier bags for glass containers and heavier items. Overall, I recommend. The hedgehogs, dogs, cats and ellies are icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Chapeauchat

customer_reviews.title: Sturday and colorful, fun print on bags
customer_reviews.text: I love the fun animal prints on the bags, and the size is great. Have found that if I use really large bags, they're too heavy to carry when loaded with groceries. I'm trying to stop adding to the waste plastic in the world, so this is a step in the right direction! They're not super easy to fold back into the pouch, but I'll probably get better with more practice, and I may not even fold them back up all the time. I can store them folded up in my car and/or purse.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeNut

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several sets of these bags; at first for myself, and then as gifts. Our state recently banned one use plastic bags so shopping has become a bit of a challenge. These bags are roomy, clerks are amazed at the amount of groceries they will hold. They wash up nicely. They are made of rip stop fabric, so they are sturdy. They are very versatile, I use them for a lot of things. And they are CUTE to boot! And I don't have to deal with the plastic bags at home anymore! Pretty good deal all the way around! I recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy G

customer_reviews.title: “The Bomb.Com
customer_reviews.text: These things fold up extremely small. You can put one in your pocket. The unfold to the perfect size. We live in California and we kept forgetting the bags. Now we keep them in the car. Nice and small for grab and go. The bag handles are comfortable for carrying even when full. The bottom of the bags are super sturdy. The stitching is great. Lastly, we put different things in different colors to get everything put away quickly at home.
customer_reviews.author: P. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT shopping bag
customer_reviews.text: This was an impulse buy, with tax they're about 3 bucks a piece, but these are worth it! They are huge, indestructible, have long handles that fit comfortably on your shoulder, easily compact into a little pouch that is securely sewn on and fits in your purse AND they are really cute!! Excellent design in every way. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: wyjomo

customer_reviews.title: Brag bag 2
customer_reviews.text: This review is like another bc I bought all bags at the same time. Absolutely LOVE. The cashier at the grocery store could’ve sold 20 of these bags in 5 minutes. Literally 3 lanes we’re listening to her talking about how sturdy these bags are and how the handles were perfect. I carry multiple on a large S clip and hang it on the buggy and she thought that was an awesome system. Multiple people asked me where I got everything.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love that they are washable!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because they are washable. After using I throw into the washer then just hang to dry. I am not sure I would wash every time I use them normally, but with the current Corona virus issue, I will continue to wash after use. I also like that they are different colors so I can use one specific color for meats. I have only used them once so far, but they seem very sturdy and holds lots of groceries.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth M. Sano

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these about a year or two ago when California went bag-less. The price was a little steep in my opinion but the reviews were great so I went ahead and made the investment. These wash great (I only wash by hand, or in a cold cycle) and hang dry. They have held up fantastic. I’m super happy with the quality and durability. They’ve held many a heavy load of groceries and have maintained their shape with absolutely no tears or unraveling seams.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Super strong. Fun and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these shopping bags. Lightweight, strong, and easy to carry in purse so they are always with you. No more forgetting my grocery bags when shopping. I have shared them with friends and am glad I keep 2 hidden away. The company BeeGreen is also to be commended for their policy of giving away products that would end up in a land dump. My friends are encouraged to buy from this very conscientious company. I live their giveaways and tell people I share them with the amazing story of this company.
customer_reviews.author: Retired RN

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I just received my first bag order. Ninety percent of reviews were 5 star so how could I go wrong?! I'm thrilled. The bags are much larger than I anticipated, but that's probably a good thing. Charming animal prints. I'm divvying them up with my daughter and granddaughter so we'll each have two. I tried one yesterday to test as a handbag. Still searching for one that is roomy, easy to to find items in, but deep enough that things won't easily fall out. It met my hopes yesterday and the elephants bring me joy to look at. :-}
customer_reviews.author: SB1249

customer_reviews.title: You should buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe i didn't buy these bags a lot earlier. I love these bags not just because it's better for the environment, but honestly and more importantly for me, it helps declutter my house from all those plastic and paper bags from the groceries! I love these bags, i had my doubts on their durability, but i was able to cram these things full of stuff and they hold up amazing. The folding of the bags could be explained a lot better, but once you get the hang of it you have no issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Tran

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous find. The material sheds most dirt and moisture. Can carry a lot of groceries, especially the odd sized stuff. Handles are wide enough to stay on the shoulders comfortably. Still would bag meat in a store bag if possible. Love how it wipes clean but you can't be too careful with meat products. Very happy and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: They’re sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while before writing this review so that I could vouch for or not vouch for the sturdiness of these bags. I use them for my dirty rags as I have a cleaning business. Which means I’m washing them over and over. I also use one for lugging around a great big binder with papers and supplies. They’re not completely waterproof. If I have wet rags in one I am aware of the surface underneath of it. That said I really like these and am going to order more. They’re pretty roomy and can be used for all sorts of things.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Mickey

customer_reviews.title: These reusable totes are amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was given one of these totes by one of my patient's mother...super sweet and thoughtful. I immediately went on line and ordered some to give as gifts to my friends. Love how compact they are, I carry them in my purse. They are super strong and do hold 50 pounds! They are machine washable which I love and they come in a ton of fun colors and designs Please help save our planet of all the plastic that is truly destroying our world! Go green and please purchase this product...you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Taylor Schell

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty with lots of storage!
customer_reviews.text: Go Green! NY is going "plastic bag free" and so my mother purchased these bags. I had the chance to try them on a big grocery shop. They are wonderful! Wide handles (for over shoulder even), lits of storage, heavy-duty material. They fold up into a little pouch, which I then put into one large carry bag and keep in my trunk. What a great environmental friendly way to go. Definitely well worth the purchase! (I've ordered more in prints!)
customer_reviews.author: Naomi C.

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and have only used them once so far. When I took one of the bags to the car, I realized that the pouch that is sewn on is already tearing off the bag! I didn't catch on anything, nor did it have excessive weight. So that would be my only complaint. The other features are nice! It's easy to fold, and they are sturdy. With plastic bags I feel like my cans/groceries would rip right through, but these don't worry me nearly the same. I felt good not contributing to any more plastic use. I would just change that one minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Bags described as waterproof. They are not waterproof. Had a leak inside of bag and fluid leaked through bottom of bag all over carpet in car. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Lighweight and sturdy bags for many uses
customer_reviews.text: With the ban on bags, these easy to use, sturdy, light weight bags make it much easier to shop with. I even used one to haul some water when I forgot my watering can and had to water a family member's flowers. The colors are fun and they do the trick. Groceries don't seem to stand upright. However, I also used them to go away for a long weekend and they were perfect for clothes, book and a laptop. I gave a few to my friends and they find they use them quite a bit for many things.
customer_reviews.author: JEK Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic bags for multiple uses. They are not as small as regular one-time-use plastic bags at the grocery stores. I bought these bags to use in place of plastic grocery bags, which are known to cause so much damage to marine life. The baggers and checkers love these bags because they are a good size and very well made. These bags could be used as tote bags to carry small items or snacks when traveling in the car. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AuntB

customer_reviews.title: WOWZA!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I've made. They are even cuter than what they looked to be on line. The fit is great--I hadn't thought about the size of the arm hole or shape of it, but the fit for me is amazing. I buy a lot of groceries, and it is terrific to be able to easily carry in as many of these as I want. I didn't even realize they folded up when I bought them--this is another definite bonus. I know what everyone is now getting for Christmas this year. Saving the planet AND being fashionable all at once? Awesome. And honestly the animal prints just make me smile. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: J. Young

customer_reviews.title: I want to use these solving problem being charged plastic bags!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love and Love Cons- they are large easily over packed by checkers at grocery store!! Pro- I am not a folder I just keep in bag came in and cram them in but they all fit easily. They are huge and can fit a lot. After months of use none them have any wear. They are super cute making so I want to use them. In my area where they charge for bags I have made my money back on them easily because I am excited to use them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hill

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, Durable and Fold down to a 2" Square
customer_reviews.text: Love these reusable bags. They're attractive, light-weight but durable, and can hold up to 50 pounds! I use them for everything! Keep one in the car to carry the things collected during the day: mail, empty plastic bottles to recycle, lite trash, library books, etc. Great for traveling: small and light, use for day trips, ob beach, carry a picnic, bring to any store. Bring to your local grocery store. Endless uses. Recommend Highly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Nice colorful bags
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve bought these type of bags. There is one difference, these have the handle on the side so they don’t fold flat as easily. The other set came nicely folded, flat in the pouch. This set was just laying flat in the box. Not folded up at all. Once folded,because of the handle placement, they are bulky. Other than that they are great bags! I use them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lautman

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!
customer_reviews.text: A friend shared these bags on Facebook, mentioning how durable they were. They are very cute so I had to try them for myself! I love how small they fold- they're also great to pack in a suitcase for travel. I've carried many cans and boxes in each one. Once you get the hang of folding them, they're very easy. They also wash really well. The only downside I've found to these bags is the bagger at the grocery store can be perplexed opening them if they haven't seen them before :) Easy remedy, I've been unfolding them while waiting in line. I would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Peters

customer_reviews.title: Not folded in their bags
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these for a gift. Unfortunates they were not already in their bags and they were too hard to fold and make them look nice to present for a first time gift. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Deb Depathy

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and incredibly useful
customer_reviews.text: This bags are great. I use them all the time. I bought several sets so I can keep some in each of my vehicles for those unexpected grocery runs. I've also used them for taking books to the library and to carry dog supplies when I go into a hotel. They also make a good bag for carrying laundry supplies to the laundromat. These bags are well made and super strong.
customer_reviews.author: Trucker Jen

customer_reviews.title: Bee grren
customer_reviews.text: I thought the product would have been of a thicker material but it is thinner than I thought it would and does not appear to be durable. Having said this, I am just starting to use this product so I am not sure yet how long it will last. It was easy to fold at all, the instructions indicate that it should be a tri-fold but I find that you had to fold the edges of the trifold to match the width size of the pouch and therefore it is more like four-five folds.
customer_reviews.author: Z G

customer_reviews.title: Study, versatile, good size
customer_reviews.text: These bags suit the purposes I had for them perfectly. For the price, they are nice to have for a lot of odd jobs. They are large enough that they are useful. One thing that I’m going to use them for is for each of my children to put their Christmas gifts in after the unwrapping. Then they can reuse them for groceries, school, overnights, etc. I had to add to this review! I have so enjoyed my bags. I took a couple to Europe with me for the last couple weeks and they were invaluable for pulling out when I needed them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not like my original bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought one if these bags at a store as a fund raiser & loved it. Bought this set of 6 as Christmas gifts and what a disappointment! The fabric is stiff making it difficult to fold into thirds & fold into the attached bag. They also changed the orientation of the handles which adds to the folding difficulty. The bags also seem smaller than my original one. I love my original bag. Too bad they cheaped out on the new style. I'm looking for different bags now
customer_reviews.author: Susan H

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and useful bags!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to share with a friend. We aren't keeping plastic bags because of Covid-19 right now. Like most women, we are always taking things back and forth to work. Usually plastic grocery bags are great for that reason. These bags are super cute and super useful. I ordered them because they are machine washable as well. I haven't used them yet but I look forward to doing so.
customer_reviews.author: T. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Roomy. Seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered these bags as who couldn’t use another reusable tote bag to keep in the car, etc? They fold up small enough to fit in my purse, the colors are adorable, and they seem sturdy! Then the other day, I bought a heated throw blanket for my aunt for Christmas and It fits perfectly I to this bag. Instead of using another Christmas gift bag, I’m going to give her the gift in one of these tote bags so she can have one for herself!
customer_reviews.author: Rebbecca

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had these bags very long yet so I don't know how they will hold up in the long run. When I received my order, 1 of the bags had a defect. I requested a replacement and got one very quickly. The bags are a little awkward to fold up but are much easier than other brands I've tried. Overall, I'm pleased with my purchase and look forward to using them more.
customer_reviews.author: H. Busch

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted some good reusable bags, but what really caught my eye on these was the fact that they’re washable and can be folded up into a small pouch! These ended up being bigger than what I initially expected but they’re so strong and durable so I never have to worry about a bag breaking! However, for me, when I carry them and I straighten my arm all the way they do sometimes graze the ground but my boyfriend has no issue with that! At first it was hard to figure out how to fold them to fit into the pouch but thanks to their instruction sheet (with displays) I was able to figure it out! Overall recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: Absterrr3

customer_reviews.title: They are good size for many uses.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bags. They are generous in size without being so large the would be hard to carry and the patterns are nice. If you did not want to keep them all for yourself or wonder if they are nice enough to gift...they are. They seem to be light but sturdy and will fold up into themselves for easy storage in a purse, backpack, glovebox, etc.... They arrived quickly and well packaged. That is always a plus. If my opinion should change I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Turtlewoman

customer_reviews.title: Helpful, easy to carry and use
customer_reviews.text: These would work very well as grocery bags...but I use them to take various sorted items [glass, cans, newspapers, white mail etc.] to the main County recycling center. They can hold heavy loads plus the "handles" can be used as ties to help keep items within the bag while transporting. I also use them to take cans and bottles to a center which pays 6 cents per item. Easy to empty. If the bags get dirty they can be washed and are good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Marruwarra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: I love these reusable bags. They are very sturdy and you can pack a lot of stuff in them. Because they are packable I can easily fit it in my purse and always carry one with me just in case I have to buy anything (as my city bans plastic bags). I also love the design on these bags and i can carry these bags on my shoulder like a big tote bag. I have bought 3 sets of these (only because I bulk buy groceries)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: Nice! And 6 is a good many!
customer_reviews.text: So I got these today and they are very sturdy and just the right size for groceries. The handles are long enough to tie so groceries don't spill out in the back of the car. 6 of them is just right and plenty to always have on hand while a few are in the wash. I like how they are easy to just throw in the wash, which is after every shopping during these times. And they are cute patterns too!
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute and work well
customer_reviews.text: These bags hold a lot, and work well. I use them for lots of needs beyond shopping. I wasn't able to fold them neatly into their little pockets the way that the instructions describe. Mine tend to be lumpy and round-ish rather than neat and flat. I still highly recommend them, though. The assortment we received, included some but not all of the styles pictured. If purchasing, try not to get too attached to the designs in the picture because you might not get them.
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bag For Multiple Uses
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased many of recycled bags in my day and these are the best ones I have. These bags live up to the advertising. They are very strong, they don’t fray or rip. You can take them with you in your purse or pocket. They wash and dry just like new. I have bought these bags for myself and for gifts. They are a great buy. I use them for groceries, toting my granddaughter’s toys, craft bag, book bag , beach bag multiple purpose bag.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Parker

customer_reviews.title: Must have totes
customer_reviews.text: Stores in New York are no longer using plastic bags; I ordered this set and I am loving them. I keep at least 3 in my bag at all times because I never know when I may stop in a store. These are lightweight but very sturdy and they hold a lot of items. They are sturdy enough to hold a watermelon without worrying about it.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Don't wait - buy these now!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bags. I can fit SO MUCH STUFF in just one! I love that they have little loops on the pouch so I can clip them to my keys. Small enough to stuff in my purse or pocket. But when they open - WOW. Super sturdy and durable. Easy to wash and dry. I can do a week of grocery shopping for a family of 4 and fit it all in 3 bags!
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Groceries to go
customer_reviews.text: Attempting to adhere to the no single use plastic laws, we have purchased numerous types of bags to use for groceries. With this latest set we have finally found the perfect bags for our needs. Durable, washable, and they fold down fairly easily after a little practice. We will pass on the too big, too stiff, too bulky and keep these - and probably purchase additional sets
customer_reviews.author: pete's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is thr second set I purchased, I let my daughter in law use one of my bags and she loved it, so I brought her a set, in our area the stores are starting to do away with plastic bags, so I always carry one or two of these bags with me , they take up so little room when folded and hold alot, I have heard from other shoppers how cute they are, and always tell them I got them on Amazon and love them
customer_reviews.author: JEAN M

customer_reviews.title: super shopper
customer_reviews.text: The bag is sturdy but lightweight. It folds up and will fit in its own little attached pouch, but I don't bother as it folds quite flat into a square. What I like best it that it not deep, but instead is wide. Therefore, the checker cannot fill it with too many items deep. You get six bags so I was able to give two to my neighbor, who loves them as well. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: Cutest bags ever!
customer_reviews.text: Got my bags today, I chose the animal collection and they are adorable, durable, easy to fold up and carry in your pocket.....everything you'd want in a reusable grocery bag. They're washable too! My grandkids are going to love these, I'll let them choose their favorites and I may end up having to get another set just for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Braudrick

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: So we have used the bags once, but my husband was AMAZED by how much they held! It took two trips to get all the bags in when the amount we bought usually takes five or six trips. These things help the environment and save you time and energy! They fold easily and fit in a bag or car so you don’t forget them! I can’t speak to the durability, but the material seems strong enough to last. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Humphrey07

customer_reviews.title: Can fold and carry in my purse.
customer_reviews.text: Love my beautifully designed shopping bags. Easily fold and can carry in my purse. I live in Manhattan and may set out to just take a walk, and then decide to stop in a grocery store. Have these wonderful bags in my purse. They are very sturdy and washable. Once came out of a grocery store and into a down pour. Paper bags began to tear. As I entered the door to my home, groceries spilled out. Highly recommend buying these bags. Great product; good value; versatile use.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel qualified to write a review yet. In fact, I may return them. The problem is folding and putting them in the sack provided. Almost impossible. But after thinking about it, why not just put them all in one of the bags when not using them? They are very lightweight and wouldn't take up much space. So, I may keep them. They are very cute.
customer_reviews.author: viki

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant to buy...Happy we did
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy these...I mean really did we need ANOTHER bag laying around the house? So glad we did. They are perfect. We were carrying around a variety of the big reusable bags from the stores but they were too bulky. We use these new bags for a lot. For a car trip...one bag with snacks and one bag for activities. For the ball field, bag is perfect for drink, snack, books/coloring books, scorebook, etc. Good for a bag to head to the pool or beach as well. The sand just shakes right out.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate to buy! Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are the nicest bags! I LOVE the print, how durable they are and how much they hold!! Machine washable is really nice. I was so impressed I sent 3 more to family members! Since they are going more green nation wide you might as well get great bags now!! You will love them!! Well worth buying!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lilli

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very handy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright solid colors but because of COVID-19 stores ask us not to bring our own bags in so I don't use them there. I currently use them to help me organize paperwork that needs to be taken care of recycle, shred, file in computer room, file in master bedroom cabinet, take care of today.
customer_reviews.author: TB D

customer_reviews.title: Frayed threads
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and received but planned to return bc of frayed threads on seams. So I got replacements but due to working out of town did not get first set returned in time and was billed for another set. 2nd set has same frayed threads though a little better. The bags look great and hold a lot. I just wish the stitching was better on what I got.
customer_reviews.author: BeachJean

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Great for the Environment
customer_reviews.text: This bags surprised me. I was a little wary at first because of how thin they felt. I thought they were going to break if I uses them. This was not the case. I put an entire gallon if milk in one of these and it didn't even strain the bag. You could probably fit two gallons and be okay. It's a hardworking bag that I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Camara

customer_reviews.title: Ideal reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags are ideal for shopping. They’re lightweight, fold up small and are sturdy. The handles are long enough to tie them shut or carry on your shoulder. They’re big enough to hold a lot of groceries, but don’t pack too much in them or you won’t be able to carry it! The bags are cute and washable too. I’m totally pleased with them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Saunders Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great Bags!
customer_reviews.text: I needed washable bags for the grocery store IF I have to go in the store. These are perfect. You get so many you can share with a friend, family member etc. IF you are the only one that uses them. They wash perfectly. Fill up nicely so I do not even use a cart. Just carry my bag(s). Well priced for what you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Nice colorful shopping bags- say no to plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely colors. Washable. Large size so can open to fit in a lot of stuffs. The material is flimsy though. Would have preferred stronger cloth. Don’t know how long this will hold. I bought these as I have stopped getting plastic bags from stores. I toss these on express wash in laundry machine and clean them. It’s a great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these so far
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight, but they hold quite a lot. We've loaded them up with big, heavy water bottles and canned goods, and they've been up to the challenge so far. (We just got them last week.) Each bag is roomy - about the size of two standard plastic grocery bags. They fold up nicely, and you can throw them in the wash if they get dirty. I store them in my car in the plastic ziplock they came in, so they're always handy.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I bought these in addition to another set I already purchased - I split both sets between my husband and myself - We absolutely love the durability, size and ease of using these bags! You won't be disappointed! They are a little bulky when folded into the pouch - I put buttons on mine to keep them closed. All in All I am very pleased with the product! Thank you BeeGreen
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Natali

customer_reviews.title: Will pays for themselves
customer_reviews.text: Plastic grocery bags will start costing 10 cents each by March 1 in my county. They will be 15 cents each in the next county over. Today, I went to the store with three. Had I used the plastic, I would have had to use about 10 bags. Total cost $1.00 for the plastic. Considering plastic is killing our oceans, I'd say it is a win-win for all!
customer_reviews.author: Catiemac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bags
customer_reviews.text: Love these...Our state is finally going to mandatory reusable bags or you pay for the ones you use...I’m so glad I picked theses. There easy on the shoulder...even if it’s extremely heavy. There waterproof which is awesome, I had a bottle to leak and it stayed in the bag instead of getting all over my car..you can’t go wrong with these...
customer_reviews.author: Gracie-1

customer_reviews.title: Good, eco-friendly purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made in a long time! They fold up easily into squares that fit in my purse, much more convenient than the ones I bought at Walmart. They're much bigger than I thought they would be which is perfect cause they can hold a lot and aren't uncomfortable to carry even when they're full. They're nice and silky with cute patterns and I'm definitely getting more in the future for my friends to help cut down on plastic bag usage.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Strong bags, great for groceries
customer_reviews.text: I love shopping at Sam's and Costco but hate the boxes. I started out with those 1.99 bags from stores like TJMaxx to place groceries, but sometimes they can't handle the weight. These bags are uber sturdy and one piece (so no worrying about strap coming off from the weight).
customer_reviews.author: Syrena

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fold
customer_reviews.text: The picture of these bags was misleading. It appeared they all came with a separate storage bag. Instead you have to fold them up to tuck inside an inside pocket. They do not fold in nice and neat, which is why I bought them. I haven't used them because they were part of a gift. I'm keeping them but am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: I keep a couple in my purse
customer_reviews.text: They fold down into pockets sewn in, small enough to easily carry in a purse or handbag. Great for festivals and markets, and just general grocery shopping. They've got lots of little helper loops on the sides, so they can be easily used in the bag holders most supermarkets have for plastic bags, and they stay open pretty well. Easy to use and cute.
customer_reviews.author: mynxkatTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Holds lots of groceries.
customer_reviews.text: Started keeping these in my car. Partner joked about them at first, but then he discovered you can fold them into the wee pouches inside each bag, and he fell in love with them. Also, they hold a ton of groceries. The handles are very easy to use -- being able to loop them over our shoulders is a huge plus. They don't smell weird after you carry meat or dairy in them.
customer_reviews.author: ykmbhappy1

customer_reviews.title: Super Fun and Functional
customer_reviews.text: These reusable grocery bags are pretty cute, yes, but they work and I like using them. Important to me is the fact that they can be easily washed or washed off. Cashiers really don't like nasty reusable bags, either. These can be kept clean which is huge. I haven't tried to fold them into a nice little square as yet. I just keep them in the trunk of the car with one holding the others.
customer_reviews.author: Ensenyo

customer_reviews.title: The best choice
customer_reviews.text: These reusable bags are thin, yet very strong. IMO, they're the perfect replacement for plastic grocery bags that are no longer in stores. They're a lot stronger for sure. Have not had to wash them yet, but they are supposed to be machine washable, so that's a major plus.
customer_reviews.author: cmm373

customer_reviews.title: Amazed at their strength!
customer_reviews.text: Buying bottled liquids in bulk, etc was always a pain to get out, home & put away... We tried using these bags, filling them with the bottles & tying off the top handles (you can still use the handles)... it gets into the car, the house & the pantry w/o dropping any of said bottles. I'm delighted as they stuff easily into the rest of the bag collection!
customer_reviews.author: The Old Hen House

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has these bags. When I saw them, had to have these reusable bags! So easy to keep a couple in your purse. So convenient. How often do you forget to take your bags into the store, or have more stuff than you realized to carry in from the car, lots of mail in the mailbox, etc. the fact they are washable is a plus also. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for grocery shopping
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight, take up little room when not in use, bright colors are easy to find, 💪 Strong enough for carrying canned goods. They are water resistant/proof. Large enough to fill with groceries without being to large that one could over fill and it be to heaving to carry. I like everything about them.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Durable and handy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because the back seat of my car was littered with reusable bags that I frequently forgot to take into the store with me.. I love these because they fold up into a small square and don't take up any room in the car or my purse. I always have at least one in my purse so I always have a bag on hand when I need it. They are deceptively large and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Great beautiful bags
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today so I haven’t had a chance to use them. They are wonderful. Beautiful colors and easy to fold into the built in pouch. Highly recommend. After a month or so: Love these bag. Very good quality. Can hold 5 2-liter Pepsi in one bag. yes I know that I should not be drinking Pepsi.
customer_reviews.author: JP of Sacramento

customer_reviews.title: Handy alternative to plastic
customer_reviews.text: The bags are colorful and seem very durable. I've only used them a couple times and they've worked fine. My only issue has been with trying to fold them (into the little pouch). My order came with no instructions and the only video on Amazon (by a customer is so grainy and blurred I can't tell what she's doing. Overall, I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: J-Sav

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these bags and I have given several away because my friends love them. I refuse to give any more away until I can purchase another batch LOL. I received them in a timely fashion. I recommend these wholeheartedly. I just had to add that the only thing bad about these is the fact I can't afford to buy all of the sets....yet anyway :)
customer_reviews.author: Malorie Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Upgrading my review
customer_reviews.text: I left a positive review when I got these bags. Today, I actually used a couple of them and now believe they deserve all 5 stars. They are larger than I thought. Seemed to be every bit as durable as other nylon type bags I got when my city banned plastic bags. Lots better than the paper-like bags stores want you to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and have handy!
customer_reviews.text: These are super convenient and wonderful quality. Took a bit of practice to fold but once you get it it is fast and easy! So much easier than bringing a whole bunch of bags that don’t fold! Now I can’t always keep one or two in my bag Incase I randomly decide to shop and didn’t plan ahead. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Larisa Mannino

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and durable.
customer_reviews.text: It took a couple of tries to get the folding technique down but well worth it. Went to a couple of local street fairs and I always down size from my usual purse as a security precaution. Clipped a couple of the folded bags onto my wallet and was good to go. So convenient! They unfolded easily and carried a variety of merchandise. Not just for groceries!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Wasmuth

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bags. They are stronger than the plastic ones from the grocery store and hold twice as much. The handles are longer too which makes for easy carrying. I use them for everything, not just the grocery store. They are easy to clean, just throw in the washing machine or wipe down with a disinfectant wipe. They store easily and don’t take up any room at all. I keep them in my car. The price was great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

product_meta.title: Grocery Bags Reusable Foldable 6 Pack Shopping Bags Large 50LBS Cute Groceries Bags with Pouch Bulk Ripstop Waterproof Machine Washable Eco-Friendly Nylon Elephant Hedgehog Cat Turtle Dog Penguin
feature_bullets: X-LARGE CAPACITY & DURABLE: BeeGreen reusable grocery bags are very big which can hold up to 50+ pounds of groceries and replaces 2-3 conventional grocery bags. And BeeGreen foldable reusable grocery bags are reinforced with bias tape which makes them hold heavy loads safely. Long handles of the reusable foldable shopping bags allow for hand holding or carry on the shoulder for easier carrying, perfect reusable grocery bags for shopping, groceries, travel, storage and practical for daily use!

CUTE ANIMAL PATTERN & EASY TO CARRY AROUND: BeeGreen reusable grocery bags foldable have 6 cute animal pattern: Penguin, Elephant, Hedgehog, Cat, Turtle, Dog. They are cute gift bags. BeeGreen reusable grocery bags foldable can be easily folded into the attached pocket-size pouch, so you can carry BeeGreen reusable grocery bags foldable in your purse or car without taking up too much space. By reusing reusable grocery bags heavy duty & keeping plastic out of landfills & oceans!

RIP-STOP FABRIC & WATERPROOF: BeeGreen grocery shopping bags are made of 100% RIP-STOP nylon cloth which is ideal fabric for grocery shopping bags. It is Lightweight but VERY Sturdy and Resistant to Rips and Water. BeeGreen large reusable shopping bags have cute pattern design. Perfect as party favors gifts for women and girls! And can add some fun to your shopping grocery by using large reusable shopping bags like these.

MACHINE WASHABLE & ECO-FRIENDLY: Being washable is a must for any cloth grocery bags. All BeeGreen cloth grocery bags are Machine Washable! Toss the cloth shopping bags right into the washer and save your time! You can reuse those cloth shopping bags and reduce your carbon footprint and plastic usage by owning BeeGreen shopping bags bulk.

1 YEAR NO-RIP GUARANTEE: We’ll replace or refund any bags that rip or break within 1 year of purchase. Message our support on Amazon for fast service. Save Money on Multiple Piece Orders with Our PACKS!
